level.text: When used in this chapter, the following words and phrases shall have the meanings ascribed:
Department – the District of Columbia Water and Sewer Authority.
Director – the General Manager of the District of Columbia Water and Sewer Authority or his or her lawful agent, representative, or designee.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 1300 (February 12, 1993); as amended by the Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 6941, 6944 (August 12, 2011).
